author: Daniel Greene
description:
From Falme to Tarmon Gai’don, The Wheel of Time is packed with massive battles that shaped the entire turning of the Wheel. In this video, we go through every major conflict — when they happened, who fought, and how each changed the world forever.

00:00 Intro
01:56 The Battle of Falma
14:08 Mat Take Of Class Disparity 
17:04 Fall of the Stone of Tier
22:03 Raid of the Stone
29:02 Invasion of the Two Rivers 
37:07 Liandrin Vs Consequences 
38:12 Galad Vs a Town
39:21 Rand Vs Ravin
01:00:33 Dumai's Wells
01:12:37 Rand Vs Sammael 
01:18:46 The Fall of Ebu Dar 
01:24:44 Rand Vs The Seanchan
01:32:52 The Cleansing 
01:45:07 Galad Goes For A Walk 
01:47:23 Seanchan Go Boom 
01:52:21 Raid on the White Tower 
01:55:23 Battle of Malden 
02:01:54 Siege of Caemlyn 
02:07:09 Rand Vs Trolloc Population Control 
02:14:51 Rand Vs Semirhage 
02:17:21 Perrin Vs Galad/Egwene Vs Black Ajah
02:51:06 Rand to the Rescue 
02:54:45 Showdown with The Gholam 
02:59:07 The Last Battle

title: Every Wheel of Time Battle Explained ⚔️
